content.rendered:
NewLine Hardscapes

NewLine Hardscapes, a division of York Building Products, takes a unique and diversified approach to the manufacturing and distribution of hardscape products for both residential and commercial use.

NewLine works with a network of authorized dealers throughout the Mid-Atlantic region to provide quality residential hardscape products.

Our products are guaranteed to meet or exceed the manufacturing standards and testing requirements of the National Concrete Masonry Association (NCMA). In addition, through our network of authorized dealers throughout the Mid-Atlantic region, we offer a local source of products and knowledgeable product champions to assist you.

 

ADDRESS

Main Office
828 East Earl Road
New Holland, PA 17557
T: 717.354.1200 Thomasville, PA Facility
5952 Lincoln Highway West
Thomasville, PA 17364
T: 717.792.4700

Products

VISIT SITE CONTACT US
